title: New font based in "Bruggenletter"...
content:
I almost finished "Mariabrug", a font based in "bruggenletter".   
   
You can check it at:   
   
 [http://www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101123852/http:/www.geocities.com/sinserif/mariabrug.gif)   
   
Original letters:   
 [http://www.jazz.futurezone.com/amster7.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101123852/http:/www.jazz.futurezone.com/amster7.htm)   
   
"Mariabrug" probably will be distributed in the next issue of www.jazz.futurezone.com   
   
Corrections and opinions are welcome.   
   
Regards.   
   
   
Ramiro Espinoza   
www.jazz.futurezone.com   
jazz@futurezone.com
author: ramiro
